name: Drillers of Uranus
description:
A prototype of a dungeon-crawler with a mining minigame, created in C++ using SDL 2 for a university assignment.

Instructions are accessed via the main menu, there is not much to the game aside from a proof-of-concept. Mainly testing for interest and ideas to see if it is worth investing time into, as such, feedback is appreciated.
